[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/9117776-1447264599.png[/img]

INSTALATION 
 1 Download mod files and copy them to main skyrim folder
 2 download latest enb  from here http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0279.htm
 3 Copy  "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" to your main skyrim folder

Edit SkyrimPrefs.ini;   bFloatPointRenderTarget=1  bTreesReceiveShadows=1  bDrawLandShadows=1  bShadowsOnGrass=1
Mods:
1. Skyrim Flora Overhaul - Skyrim Flora Overhaul v2.3
2. Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Final Edition
3. Realistic Water Two
4. Enhanced Lights and FX
5. 4K Parallax all mods(4K-SMIM,4K-Misc,4K-Landscape,4K-Farmhouse,4K-Dungeons,4K-Cities)SkyUI
Immersive First Person View - First Person 2_7
Enhanced Blood Textures
ApachiiSkyHair - ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full
ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture - ApachiiSkyHair a NATURAL retexture
Enhanced Horse Skins - Enhanced Horse Skins 03
